science.question: These are places of arid land with really low rainfall and high tempertures variation. Their vegetation is insignificant and the population of people and animals is very limited.

A turkey makes you sleepy as it contains the natural sedative L-tryptophan

science.correct_answer: A turkey makes you sleepy as it contains the natural sedative L-tryptophan

Nearly everybody has experienced the tip-of-the-tongue situation when one is eagerly trying to think of a relatively familiar fact, name or word and is just about to recall it, but it constantly eludes him.  What is the explanation of this strange experience?
options: Unpleasant experience associated with the memory
Another item is blocking the recollection
science.correct_answer: Another item is blocking the recollection

science.question: Which of these most accurately explains the controversial issue of  false memories?
options: Memories formed under the influence of misleading suggestions and clues
Memories lacking coherent and logical rationale
science.correct_answer: Memories formed under the influence of misleading suggestions and clues

science.question: What is the main cause for most pandemics in history?
